promptVersions.body:
1. Science Based Target Status : If the supplier has set an SBT, they can indicate their SBT status, such as Planning, Target Set, Committed, or Declined.
  2. Supplier Emissions Reduction Commitment Type: The supplier may have set an emissions reduction commitment type based on their vision, such as 1.5° Celsius, 2° Celsius etc.
  3. Scope 1 Emissions (tCO₂e) : The total/apportioned scope 1 emissions value
  4. Scope 2 Location-Based Emissions (tCO₂e): The scope 2 emissions value calculated based on the location-based data of grid emissions
  5. Supplier-Provided Emissions Type : The type of emissions data provided by the supplier. It could be one of:
  • Supplier-Allocated Emissions: Used when the supplier’s scope 1, 2, or 3 emissions value is the final allocated value.
  • Total Supplier Emissions: Used when the supplier’s total corporate GHG emissions is the data provided by the supplier.
promptVersions.title: Key info provided by Suppliers
